info.title: OpenAPI Eigen Explorer
info.description: Api reference for the Eigen Explorer

get.description: Retrive if operator is registered, joined, or left AVS

page.description: The page number to retrieve

limit.description: The number of records per page

200.description: The list of operator activity history.

createdAtBlock.description: The block number of the event

total.description: Total number of records in the database

page.description: The page number of the current query

limit.description: The number of records returned for this query

get.description: Retrive restake history by operator

page.description: The page number to retrieve

limit.description: The number of records per page

200.description: The list of restake history by operator.

shares.description: The shares

createdAtBlock.description: The block number of the event

total.description: Total number of records in the database

page.description: The page number of the current query

limit.description: The number of records returned for this query

get.description: Returns operator details including socket, batches details

totalActiveBatchesCount.description: The operator's total active batches count

get.description: Returns summary metrics, including TVLs for both restaking strategies and the Beacon Chain ETH strategy, as well as the total number of AVS, operators, and stakers.

tvlBeaconChain.description: The total value locked (TVL) in ETH in the beacon chain ETH strategy

additionalProperties.description: The total value locked (TVL) in the strategy, denominated in the strategy's native token

tvlStrategies.description: The total value locked (TVL) in each restaking strategy, denominated in the strategy's native token

totalOperators.description: The total number of AVS operators

totalStakers.description: The total number of AVS stakers

get.description: Returns the total value locked (TVL) in all restaking strategies and Beacon Chain restaking.

200.description: The value of the combined TVL in ETH.

tvlBeaconChain.description: The total value locked (TVL) in ETH in the beacon chain ETH strategy

additionalProperties.description: The total value locked (TVL) in the strategy, denominated in the strategy's native token

tvlStrategies.description: The total value locked (TVL) in each restaking strategy, denominated in the strategy's native token

get.summary: Retrieve a strategy TVL by name
get.description: Returns the total value locked (TVL) in a specific LST strategy.

strategyName.description: The name of the restaking strategy

200.description: The value of combined restaking strategy TVL and a breakdown of the TVL for each individual strategy.

tvl.description: The value of the restaking strategy TVL, denominated in the strategy's native token

get.description: Returns the total number of AVS registered.

200.description: The total number of AVS registered.

total.description: The total number of AVS registered

get.summary: Retrieve total number of AVS operators
get.description: Returns the total number of AVS operators registered.

200.description: The total number of AVS operators registered.

total.description: The total number of AVS operators registered

get.summary: Retrieve total number of AVS stakers
get.description: Returns the total number of AVS stakers registered.

200.description: The total number of AVS stakers registered.

total.description: The total number of AVS stakers registered

get.description: Returns the total number of withdrawals.
Returns the total number of deposits.
Returns all staker records. This endpoint supports pagination.

withTvl.description: Toggle whether the route should calculate the TVL from shares

page.description: The page number to retrieve

limit.description: The number of records per page

address.description: The contract address of the staker

createdAtBlock.description: The block number at which the Staker made first delegation

updatedAtBlock.description: The block number at which the Staker made last delegation

createdAt.description: The time stamp at which the Staker made first delegation

updatedAt.description: The time stamp at which the Staker made last delegation

strategyAddress.description: The contract address of the restaking strategy

shares.description: The amount of shares held in the strategy

tvlBeaconChain.description: The TVL of Beacon Chain restaking strategy in ETH

tvlWETH.description: The TVL of WETH restaking strategy in ETH

additionalProperties.description: The total value locked (TVL) in the strategy, denominated in the strategy's native token

tvlStrategies.description: The TVL of each individual restaking strategy in its native token

tvl.description: The total value locked (TVL) in the AVS

total.description: Total number of records in the database

page.description: The page number of the current query

limit.description: The number of records returned for this query

get.description: Returns a staker record by address.

withTvl.description: Toggle whether the route should calculate the TVL from shares

200.description: The record of the requested operator.

address.description: The contract address of the staker

createdAtBlock.description: The block number at which the Staker made first delegation

updatedAtBlock.description: The block number at which the Staker made last delegation

createdAt.description: The time stamp at which the Staker made first delegation

updatedAt.description: The time stamp at which the Staker made last delegation

strategyAddress.description: The contract address of the restaking strategy

shares.description: The amount of shares held in the strategy

tvlBeaconChain.description: The TVL of Beacon Chain restaking strategy in ETH

tvlWETH.description: The TVL of WETH restaking strategy in ETH

additionalProperties.description: The total value locked (TVL) in the strategy, denominated in the strategy's native token

tvlStrategies.description: The TVL of each individual restaking strategy in its native token

tvl.description: The total value locked (TVL) in the AVS

get.summary: Retrieve all withdrawals by staker address
get.description: Returns all withdrawal data of the requested staker, including the withdrawal root, nonce, withdrawal status, and other relevant information.

address.description: The contract address of the staker

page.description: The page number to retrieve

limit.description: The number of records per page

withdrawalRoot.description: The root hash of the withdrawal

delegatedTo.description: The operator address to which staking is delegated

strategyAddress.description: The contract address of the restaking strategy

shares.description: The amount of shares held in the strategy
The list of strategy shares

createdAtBlock.description: The block number when the withdrawal was recorded by EigenExplorer

createdAt.description: The time stamp when the withdrawal was recorded by EigenExplorer

updatedAtBlock.description: The block number when the withdrawal was last updated

updatedAt.description: The time stamp when the withdrawal was last updated

isCompleted.description: Indicates if the withdrawal is completed

total.description: Total number of records in the database

page.description: The page number of the current query

limit.description: The number of records returned for this query

get.summary: Retrieve all deposits by staker address
get.description: Returns all deposit data of the requested staker, including the transaction hash, token address, strategy address, shares and other relevant information.

address.description: The contract address of the staker

page.description: The page number to retrieve

limit.description: The number of records per page

strategyAddress.description: The contract address of the restaking strategy

shares.description: The amount of shares held in the strategy

createdAtBlock.description: The block number when the withdrawal was recorded by EigenExplorer

createdAt.description: The time stamp when the withdrawal was recorded by EigenExplorer

total.description: Total number of records in the database

page.description: The page number of the current query

limit.description: The number of records returned for this query

get.description: Returns all AVS records. This endpoint supports pagination.

withTvl.description: Toggle whether the route should calculate the TVL from shares

sortByTotalOperators.description: Sort results in asc or desc order of total AVS (only valid for AVS queries)

page.description: The page number to retrieve

limit.description: The number of records per page

metadataDiscord.description: The URL of the AVS's Discord server

metadataLogo.description: The URL of the AVS's logo

metadataTelegram.description: The URL of the AVS's Telegram channel

metadataWebsite.description: The URL of the AVS's website

metadataX.description: The URL of the AVS's X

metadataURI.description: The URI of the AVS metadata

totalStakers.description: The total number of stakers staking in the AVS

totalOperators.description: The total number of operators operating the AVS

createdAtBlock.description: The block number at which the AVS was created

updatedAtBlock.description: The block number at which the AVS was last updated

createdAt.description: The time stamp at which the AVS was created

updatedAt.description: The time stamp at which the AVS was last updated

strategyAddress.description: The contract address of the restaking strategy

shares.description: The amount of shares held in the strategy

get.summary: Retrieve all stakers for a given AVS address
get.description: Returns all stakers for a given AVS address. This endpoint supports pagination.

withTvl.description: Toggle whether the route should calculate the TVL from shares

page.description: The page number to retrieve

limit.description: The number of records per page

200.description: The stakers record found for the AVS.

address.description: The contract address of the staker

createdAtBlock.description: The block number at which the Staker made first delegation

updatedAtBlock.description: The block number at which the Staker made last delegation

createdAt.description: The time stamp at which the Staker made first delegation

limit.description: The number of records returned for this query

400.description: The server cannot or will not process the request due to something that is perceived to be a client error (e.g., malformed request syntax, invalid request message framing, or deceptive request routing).

code.description: A short code indicating the error code returned.

message.description: A human readable explanation of what went wrong.
message.example: The requested resource was not found.

doc_url.description: A link to our documentation with more details about this error code

401.description: Although the HTTP standard specifies "unauthorized", semantically this response means "unauthenticated". That is, the client must authenticate itself to get the requested response.

code.description: A short code indicating the error code returned.

message.description: A human readable explanation of what went wrong.
message.example: The requested resource was not found.

doc_url.description: A link to our documentation with more details about this error code

403.description: The client does not have access rights to the content; that is, it is unauthorized, so the server is refusing to give the requested resource. Unlike 401 Unauthorized, the client's identity is known to the server.

code.description: A short code indicating the error code returned.

message.description: A human readable explanation of what went wrong.
message.example: The requested resource was not found.

doc_url.description: A link to our documentation with more details about this error code

404.description: The server cannot find the requested resource.

code.description: A short code indicating the error code returned.

message.description: A human readable explanation of what went wrong.
message.example: The requested resource was not found.

doc_url.description: A link to our documentation with more details about this error code

422.description: The request was well-formed but was unable to be followed due to semantic errors.

code.description: A short code indicating the error code returned.

message.description: A human readable explanation of what went wrong.
message.example: The requested resource was not found.

doc_url.description: A link to our documentation with more details about this error code

429.description: The user has sent too many requests in a given amount of time ("rate limiting")

code.description: A short code indicating the error code returned.

message.description: A human readable explanation of what went wrong.
message.example: The requested resource was not found.

doc_url.description: A link to our documentation with more details about this error code

500.description: The server has encountered a situation it does not know how to handle.

code.description: A short code indicating the error code returned.

message.description: A human readable explanation of what went wrong.
message.example: The requested resource was not found.

doc_url.description: A link to our documentation with more details about this error code
